name: Engadget Fixes
description:
I got annoyed by the fonts and colours of the new Engadget, so I threw together this style.

Changes link colours to a more legible blue
Removes ALL text styling (blasted italics!)
Removes Times New Roman
Fixes comment padding to stop bottom line getting cut off

Here's how it looks on my screen : http://twitpic.com/qo60v/full

style 19594 was used for the Firefox toolbars.
